definition[0]: the elder of two people, especially brothers and sisters, is the one who was born first
example[0]: Sarah is the elder of the two.
example[1]: His elder son Liam became a lawyer.
definition[1]: a member of a tribe or other social group who is important and respected because they are old
example[2]: a meeting of the village elders
definition[2]: someone who has an official position of responsibility in some Christian churches
definition[3]: a small wild tree that has white flowers and black berries
